specialRules.title: Shield Disruptor
description: Each Shield Disruptor hit knocks down two Powerfields, Shadowfields or Void Shields, rounding fractions down in favour of the target. In addition, Shield Disruptor hits ignores Ion Shields.

unit.name: Vampire Raider
specialRules: Transport (May carry up to eight of the following: Farseer, Guardians, Eldar Rangers, Pathfinder, Heavy Weapon Platform, Support Weapon Platform, Howling Banshees, Striking Scorpions, Fire Dragons, Dire Avengers, Dark Reapers, Warp Spiders, Swooping Hawks. Wraithguards and Wraithblades take two spaces each).
unit.crit: The Vampire Raider and all units on board are destroyed.

unit.name: Corsair Vampire Hunter
specialRules: Transport: (May carry 4 Ghost Walkers or 4 Wasp Walkers)
unit.crit: The Corsair Vampire Hunter and all units on board are destroyed.

unit.name: Wraithship
specialRules: Is equipped with either Orbital Bombardment or one Pin Point attack (may be chosen at the start of battle).

unit.name: Dragonship
specialRules: Is equipped with either Orbital Bombardment or two Pin Point attacks (may be chosen at the start of battle).
Transport (May carry up to 12 Vampires and any units transported within them)
